com.cse110team24.walkwalkrevolution.firebase.firestore.services

Interface UsersDatabaseService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DatabaseService, Subject<UsersDatabaseServiceObserver>, UsersDatabaseServiceSubject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FirebaseFirestoreAdapterUsers, TestUsersDatabaseService

    public interface UsersDatabaseService
extends UsersDatabaseServiceSubject, DatabaseService
    Handles provider database interactions with user-related documents and collections.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.cse110team24.walkwalkrevolution.firebase.firestore.DatabaseService

        DatabaseService.Service

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cse110team24.walkwalkrevolution.firebase.firestore.subjects.UsersDatabaseServiceSubject

    • Method Detail

      • createUserInDatabase

        void createUserInDatabase(IUser user)
        Create a user document in this service's provider database.
        Parameters:
        user - the signed in user whose document is being created. User must have a defined email.

      • updateUserTeamUidInDatabase

        void updateUserTeamUidInDatabase(IUser user,
                                 java.lang.String teamUid)
        Update an existing user document's teamUid field in this service's provider database
        Parameters:
        user - the currently signed in user, who already has an existing user document. User must have a defined email.
        teamUid - the teamUid that will be set to the document's field

      • getUserData

        void getUserData(IUser user)
        Query this service's provider database for the given user's data. On complete, a call to is made with the requested user's data.
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose data is being requested. User must have a defined email.

      • checkIfOtherUserExists

        void checkIfOtherUserExists(java.lang.String userDocumentKey)
        Query this service's provider database for a user given userDocumentKey.

        If user exists, a call to UsersDatabaseServiceSubject.notifyObserversIfUserExists(boolean, IUser) with value true and the requested user's data, otherwise, with the call is made with value false and null user data.

        Parameters:
        userDocumentKey - the requested user's documentKey. Must be in the form of a an email with non-alphanumeric characters removed.
